Find a position
Find a position that you prefer. 
You can help the baby’s head 
descend:
• If you stand up, sit forward, 
kneel or squat (squatting 
may	be	difficult	if	you	are	
not used to it).
• If you are very tired, you 
might be more comfortable 
lying on your side. This 
position is better for your 
baby than lying on your 
back.
• You	may	find	kneeling	on	
all fours might be helpful if 
you	s
